text: The Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia is in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It is the largest Islamic arts museum in Southeast Asia and has over 7,000 artifacts from the Islamic world. The museum was first proposed in 1997 by then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad and opened in December 1998. ==References== Category:1998 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Malaysia Category:Art museums Category:Museums in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Kuala Lumpur
title: Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia
